title: Add authentication gate with Internet Identity and update landing page design

requirements.summary: Implement an authentication gate using Internet Identity that requires users to log in before accessing any app routes beyond the login page
acceptanceCriteria: Users are redirected to a login page when not authenticated
Internet Identity authentication supports passkey, email, and phone number methods
After successful login, users can access all app routes
Authentication state persists across page refreshes

file_operations.description: Create a dedicated login page that presents the Internet Identity authentication interface with support for passkey, email, and phone number methods. Use the existing useInternetIdentity hook to trigger login flow.
Create a route guard component that checks authentication status using the useInternetIdentity hook. Redirect unauthenticated users to the login page while allowing access to authenticated users.

Update router configuration to add the login route and wrap all existing routes (walk, transform, stats, settings, landing) with the ProtectedRoute component to enforce authentication. Ensure the login route remains accessible without authentication.
Add a logout button to the navigation header that uses the useInternetIdentity hook to sign out users and redirect them to the login page.

requirements.summary: Add transparent decorative background elements featuring weights/dumbbells and nature imagery positioned around the screen edges
acceptanceCriteria: Decorative weight/dumbbell images are visible with transparency around screen edges
Nature elements (leaves, mountains, trees) are visible with transparency around screen edges
Decorative elements do not interfere with interactive UI components
Elements are positioned consistently across all pages

file_operations.description: Add fixed-position decorative image elements using the generated assets frontend/public/assets/generated/weight-decoration-left.dim_200x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/weight-decoration-right.dim_200x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/nature-decoration-top.dim_400x200.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/nature-decoration-bottom.dim_400x200.png. Position them at screen corners with low opacity (0.15-0.25) and z-index below interactive content to ensure they don't interfere with UI components.
Add CSS classes for decorative background elements with appropriate opacity, positioning, and pointer-events: none to ensure they don't block interaction with UI components.

requirements.summary: Update the motivational quote on the landing page to 'Exercise today and be proud of yourself tomorrow'
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page displays the new quote 'Exercise today and be proud of yourself tomorrow'
Quote maintains prominent visual styling consistent with existing design

file_operations.description: Replace the existing motivational quote text with 'Exercise today and be proud of yourself tomorrow' while preserving the current visual styling and placement.

requirements.summary: Remove the unwanted image from the main landing page
acceptanceCriteria: Unwanted image element is removed from the landing page
Page layout remains intact after image removal
No broken image links or placeholders remain

file_operations.description: Remove the unwanted image element that was not part of the original user request. Ensure the page layout adjusts properly and no broken references remain.

requirements.summary: Wire generated decorative images as static assets for background decoration
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are saved to frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images have transparent backgrounds suitable for overlay decoration
Weight and nature images are visually cohesive with the fitness app theme

file_operations.description: Reference the exact generated image files frontend/public/assets/generated/weight-decoration-left.dim_200x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/weight-decoration-right.dim_200x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/nature-decoration-top.dim_400x200.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/nature-decoration-bottom.dim_400x200.png as static assets in the decorative background implementation.
